data.name: ABILITIES
data.value: Abilities

data.name: BANSHEE
data.value: Banshee

data.name: BANSHEE_EV1
data.value: Scream into the microphone

data.name: BANSHEE_EV1_D
data.value: With a chance (25%) emits a unique sound into a directed microphone.

data.name: BANSHEE_EV2
data.value: Singing

data.name: BANSHEE_EV2_D
data.value: Has an increased chance of a singing ghost event.

data.name: BANSHEE_EV3
data.value: Decrease in sanity upon touch

data.name: BANSHEE_EV3_D
data.value: The target will lose 15% sanity if they touch the ghost during a singing ghost event (the event must be directed at the target, not another player).

data.name: BANSHEE_EV4
data.value: Observes the sanity of the target

data.name: BANSHEE_EV4_D
data.value: The Banshee's hunt is influenced only by the target's percentage sanity, not the team's overall sanity.

data.name: BANSHEE_EV5
data.value: Target pursuit

data.name: BANSHEE_EV5_D
data.value: Only pursue the selected target during the hunt. (If the target is outside the location, the Banshee will behave like a regular ghost).

data.name: BANSHEE_EV6
data.value: Hunt begins only after proximity.

data.name: BEHAVIOUR
data.value: Behaviour

data.name: DEMON
data.value: Demon

data.name: DEMON_EV1
data.value: Delay in hunting after smudging

data.name: DEMON_EV1_D
data.value: If you light sage near a Demon, it cannot begin hunting for the next 60 seconds.

data.name: DEMON_EV2
data.value: Short interval between hunts

data.name: DEMON_EV2_D
data.value: The minimum interval between attacks is 20 seconds (25 seconds for other ghosts).

data.name: DEMON_EV3
data.value: Increased crusifix radius

data.name: DEMON_EV3_D
data.value: The range of the Crucifix is increased by 50% (4.5m, 6m, and 7.5m respectively).

data.name: DEMON_EV4
data.value: Hunts anytime

data.name: DEMON_EV4_D
data.value: Hunts with any sanity level

data.name: DOTS
data.value: DOTs

data.name: EMF5
data.value: EMF 5

data.name: FREEZING
data.value: Freezing

data.name: GHOST_ORBS
data.value: Ghost Orbs

data.name: HUNT_SANITY
data.value: Hunt and sanity

data.name: JINN
data.value: Jinn

data.name: JINN_EV1
data.value: Does not turn off the breaker

data.name: JINN_EV1_D
data.value: Never turns off the breaker. (Do not confuse with overload caused by a large number of lights turned on)

data.name: JINN_EV2
data.value: Lowers sanity within 3 meters of itself when the breaker is on.

data.name: JINN_EV2_D
data.value: Burns 25% of sanity for all players within 3 meters of itself if the breaker is on; also, an EMF reading appears on the breaker.

data.name: MARE
data.value: Mare

data.name: MARE_EV1
data.value: Does not turn on lights

data.name: MARE_EV1_D
data.value: The Mare never turns on lights but instead has an increased chance to turn them off.

data.name: MARE_EV2
data.value: Smashes light bulbs

data.name: MARE_EV2_D
data.value: The Mare has an increased chance of a ghost event involving smashing light bulbs.

data.name: MARE_EV3
data.value: Walks into dark rooms

data.name: MARE_EV3_D
data.value: It has an increased chance of wandering from a lit room into a dark one

data.name: MARE_EV4
data.value: Instantly turns off the lights

data.name: MARE_EV4_D
data.value: Instantly turns off the lights (switch) that the player has just turned on (no more than once every 10 seconds)

data.name: MARE_EV5
data.value: Turns off the lights during a ghost event

data.name: MARE_EV5_D
data.value: Can turn off the lights during a paranormal event, not just before its onset.

data.name: PHANTOM
data.value: Phantom

data.name: PHANTOM_EV1
data.value: Disappearance after photo

data.name: PHANTOM_EV1_D
data.value: If you photograph it during a ghost event (or on the summoning circle, music box), it will disappear immediately after the flash, the electronics will stop malfunctioning, and the heartbeat will stop, but the event will continue. There will be no interference in the photo and no ghost. (If you photograph it during an attack, there will also be no interference and no ghost in the photo).

data.name: PHANTOM_EV2
data.value: EMF during the chase

data.name: PHANTOM_EV2_D
data.value: Approach a random player, and in the place where it arrives, you will get an EMF reading. The attack will not begin until it reaches its destination.

data.name: PHANTOM_EV3
data.value: Lowers sanity within 10 meters of itself.

data.name: PHANTOM_EV3_D
data.value: Being within 10 meters of the Phantom decreases the player's sanity at a rate of 0.4-0.5% per second.

data.name: POLTERGEIST
data.value: Poltergeist

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV1
data.value: Strong throw

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV1_D
data.value: Can throw objects with greater force than other ghosts.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV2
data.value: Throws objects during hunts

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV2_D
data.value: During hunts, it has a 100% chance to throw an object every 0.5 seconds.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV3
data.value: Decreases sanity due to throwing objects.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV3_D
data.value: For each object thrown by the poltergeist, 2% of sanity is deducted from those who witnessed the throw.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV4
data.value: Multiple throws

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV4_D
data.value: Can throw multiple objects simultaneously.

data.name: REVENANT
data.value: Revenant

data.name: REVENANT_EV1
data.value: Slower when not in sight of a player

data.name: REVENANT_EV1_D
data.value: The Revenant moves at a speed of 1 m/s when it cannot see or hear players and does not sense their electronics.

data.name: SHADOW
data.value: Shadow

data.name: SHADOW_EV1
data.value: Does not interact when players are present

data.name: SHADOW_EV1_D
data.value: If at least one player is in the room with the Shade, it ceases to interact with the environment (except for candles).

data.name: SHADOW_EV2
data.value: Does not hunt when players are present.

data.name: SHADOW_EV2_D
data.value: The Shade cannot initiate an attack in a room with a player.

data.name: SHADOW_EV3
data.value: Shade during ghost events

data.name: SHADOW_EV3_D
data.value: During ghost events, the Shade is more likely to appear in its shadow form.

data.name: SHADOW_EV4
data.value: Smoke model during ghost events

data.name: SHADOW_EV4_D
data.value: High chance of a ghost event taking the form of a mist.

data.name: SHADOW_EV5
data.value: Shadow form when using cursed items

data.name: SHADOW_EV5_D
data.value: The Shade is the only ghost that, when using the Ouija board or spirit box, can appear in its shadow form.

data.name: SHADOW_EV6
data.value: Does not trigger a ghost event at 100% sanity

data.name: SHADOW_EV6_D
data.value: With each percentage of total sanity lost, the Shade increases its chance of manifesting a paranormal event by 2%.

data.name: SPEED
data.value: Speed

data.name: SPIRIT_BOX
data.value: Spirit Box

data.name: STANDART
data.value: Standart

data.name: TELLS
data.value: Tells

data.name: ULTRAVIOLET
data.value: Ultraviolet

data.name: WRITING
data.value: Writing

data.name: PARABOLIC_MIC_SCREAM
data.value: Parabolic Microphone scream

data.name: PARABOLIC_MIC_SCREAM_DSCR
data.value: A player can hear the unique scream through Parabolic Microphone

data.name: SALT_FOOTPRINTS
data.value: Salt footprints

data.name: SALT_FOOTPRINTS_DSCR
data.value: Wraith never leaves footprints on salt

data.name: WRAITH
data.value: Wraith

data.name: SANITY
data.value: Sanity

data.name: BANSHEE_EV6_D
data.value: Outside of the hunt, the Banshee can go to its target, and then return to the room until the Banshee reaches its destination and the hunt begins. (P.S. The Banshee cannot reach its target if it is on another floor)

data.name: YUREI
data.value: Yurei

data.name: YUREI_EV1
data.value: Doesn't leave the room when stoned

data.name: YUREI_EV1_D
data.value: If you light incense near Yurei, he will not be able to leave the room for 60 seconds.

data.name: YUREI_EV2
data.value: Closes the doors

data.name: YUREI_EV2_D
data.value: Slams the open door with a click outside the guest event (delay about 2 seconds), lowering the sanity of players within a radius of 7.5 m by 15%.

data.name: YUREI_EV3
data.value: Double door interaction

data.name: YUREI_EV3_D
data.value: Can produce double interaction with a door outside of a guest event.

data.name: YUREI_EV4
data.value: Interacts with the front door

data.name: YUREI_EV4_D
data.value: The only ghost capable of interacting with the front door outside of paranormal activity.

data.name: ONI
data.value: Oni

data.name: ONI_EV1
data.value: Removes 20% Sanity

data.name: ONI_EV1_D
data.value: During paranormal events, removes 20% of sanity, instead of the standard 10%.

data.name: ONI_EV2
data.value: Doesn't call air ball

data.name: ONI_EV2_D
data.value: Cannot issue a guest event in the form of a cloud/air ball.

data.name: YOKAI
data.value: Yokai

data.name: YOKAI_EV1
data.value: Hunting, if conversations are nearby

data.name: YOKAI_EV1_D
data.value: Can begin hunting up to 80% Sanity if players talk near him.

data.name: YOKAI_EV2
data.value: Hears and senses electronics within a 2.5 m radius

data.name: YOKAI_EV2_D
data.value: During a hunt, he hears the voices of players and senses their electronics only within a radius of up to 2.5 m from himself.

data.name: YOKAI_EV3
data.value: Spawn close to the box

data.name: YOKAI_EV3_D
data.value: The radius of materialization from the box is 2.5 meters, instead of 5 meters

data.name: HANTU
data.value: Hantu

data.name: HANTU_EV1
data.value: Increased chance to turn off the shield

data.name: HANTU_EV1_D
data.value: Never turns on the shield; on the contrary, it has an increased chance of turning it off.

data.name: HANTU_EV2
data.value: Constant evidence of sub-zero temperature

data.name: HANTU_EV2_D
data.value: Hantu always has the “Minus Temperature” clue on Nightmare or Madness.

data.name: HANTU_EV3
data.value: Speed ??depends on the room

data.name: HANTU_EV3_D
data.value: Hantu speed depends on room temperature

data.name: HANTU_EV4
data.value: Steam from the mouth

data.name: HANTU_EV4_D
data.value: Emits steam from its mouth if the shield is turned off at the location.

data.name: GORYO
data.value: Goryo

data.name: GORYO_EV1
data.value: Doesn't change room

data.name: GORYO_EV1_D
data.value: Grief will never change its room (the exception is when using the wish "I want my sanity back" on the monkey's paw)

data.name: GORYO_EV2
data.value: Sits in the room

data.name: GORYO_EV2_D
data.value: Cannot walk long distances from his room

data.name: GORYO_EV3
data.value: DOTS only via camera without players

data.name: GORYO_EV3_D
data.value: Appears on DOTS only through a video camera and when there are no players in the room (it can appear in a room with a player, but the chance of this is very low).

data.name: GORYO_EV4
data.value: Permanent evidence “Laser projector”

data.name: GORYO_EV4_D
data.value: Goryo will always have the “Laser Projector” clue on Nightmare and Madness.

data.name: MYLING
data.value: Myling

data.name: MYLING_EV1
data.value: Walks quietly

data.name: MYLING_EV1_D
data.value: Makes sounds more often into a directional microphone than other ghosts

data.name: MYLING_EV1_D
data.value: Makes sounds more often into a directional microphone than other ghosts

data.name: MYLING_EV2
data.value: Talks a lot into the microphone

data.name: MYLING_EV2_D
data.value: Makes sounds more often into a directional microphone than other ghosts

data.name: ONRYO
data.value: Onryo

data.name: ONRYO_EV1
data.value: The candle works like a crucifix

data.name: ONRYO_EV1_D
data.value: The flame works on Onryo like a crucifix (radius 4 meters). The candle always takes precedence over the crucifix.

data.name: THE_TWINS
data.value: The Twins

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV1
data.value: The crucifix only works for the main guest

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV1_D
data.value: The crucifix will only work on the “real” ghost (the main twin)

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV2
data.value: Varying speed depending on appearance

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV2_D
data.value: Speed ??if the ghost started hunting from the standard range ("main twin") = 1.53 m/s, and from the extended range ("shadow twin") = 1.87 m/s

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV3
data.value: Non-primary guest has no signs

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV3_D
data.value: The Shadow Twin does not respond via radio, does not affect temperature, and does not follow motion sensors.

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV4
data.value: Equal chance to start hunting from different places

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV4_D
data.value: Each twin has a 50% chance of starting a hunt (the shadow twin will start from the location of their last interaction).

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV5
data.value: He interrupts the guest event himself

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV5_D
data.value: He can interrupt his paranormal activity himself. When one of the twins gives a guest event, the other can interact and the guest event will be interrupted.

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV6
data.value: Two actions at the same time

data.name: THE_TWINS_EV6_D
data.value: Performs 2 actions simultaneously within a range of 3 meters from himself (standard range/"main twin") and 16 meters (extended range/"shadow twin"). At the same time, a broken line will appear on the activity graph

data.name: RAIJU
data.value: Raiju

data.name: RAIJU_EV1
data.value: Previously, hunting with devices turned on

data.name: RAIJU_EV1_D
data.value: Can start hunting with 65% sanity if there is at least one switched on electronic device nearby.

data.name: RAIJU_EV2
data.value: Speeds up if the player's device is turned on

data.name: RAIJU_EV2_D
data.value: Accelerates up to 2.5 m/s if the player's electronic equipment is turned on nearby. Small cards - 6 meters; Medium cards - 8 meters; Large cards - 10 meters.

data.name: RAIJU_EV3
data.value: Increased interference radius

data.name: RAIJU_EV3_D
data.value: Raiju will interfere with electronic equipment at a distance of 15 meters, instead of the standard 10 meters.

data.name: OBAKE
data.value: Obake

data.name: OBAKE_EV1
data.value: Doesn't always leave fingerprints

data.name: OBAKE_EV1_D
data.value: Obake leaves prints with a 75% chance

data.name: OBAKE_EV2
data.value: Changes its model

data.name: OBAKE_EV2_D
data.value: While hunting, Obake has a 6.66% chance each time he blinks to transform into another ghost model of the same gender.

data.name: OBAKE_EV3
data.value: Always gives Ultraviolet

data.name: OBAKE_EV3_D
data.value: Obake always has the Ultraviolet ability on Nightmare or Madness.

data.name: OBAKE_EV4
data.value: Many fingers

data.name: OBAKE_EV4_D
data.value: leaves a unique fingerprint with a probability of 16.7% (6 fingers on doors, 2 fingers on switches, 5 on keyboards and grilles)

data.name: OBAKE_EV5
data.value: Prints disappear quickly

data.name: OBAKE_EV5_D
data.value: halves the remaining time for all prints on location.

data.name: MIMIC
data.value: Mimic

data.name: MOROI
data.value: Moroi

data.name: DEOGEN
data.value: Deogen

data.name: THAYE
data.value: Thaye

data.name: BLINK
data.value: Blink

data.name: MOROI_EV1
data.value: Places a curse through speech

data.name: MOROI_EV1_D
data.value: Places a curse on the player via radio or directional microphone. The curse doubles the rate at which the sanity of the player on whom it is cast decreases (you can pause it by leaving the house or drinking a sedative, thereby removing it completely).

data.name: MOROI_EV2
data.value: Smudge Stick Stunning

data.name: MOROI_EV2_D
data.value: Smudge Stick stunning duration during a hunt increased by 50% (7.5 seconds).

data.name: MOROI_EV3
data.value: Speed depends on sanity

data.name: MOROI_EV3_D
data.value:
The speed of the Moroi depends on the team's average sanity. For every 5% of average sanity lost, the Moroi increases its speed by 0.075 m/s:
50% - 1.5 m/s 45% - 1.575 m/s 40% - 1.65 m/s 35% - 1.725 m/s 30% - 1.8 m/s 25% - 1.825 m/s 20% - 1.95 m/s 15% - 2.025 m/s 10% - 2.1 m/s 5% - 2.175 m/s 0% - 2.25 m/s

data.name: MOROI_EV4
data.value: Permanent evidence: Spirit Box

data.name: MOROI_EV4_D
data.value: The Moroi always has the 'Spirit Box' evidence on Nightmare or Insanity difficulty

data.name: THAYE_EV1
data.value: Ages

data.name: THAYE_EV1_D
data.value:
The speed, hunt threshold, and behavior of the Thaye depend on its age.
The sanity threshold starts at 75%. For each aging phase, this value decreases by 6%, with a final value of 15%. Speed starts at 2.75 m/s. For each aging phase, this value decreases by 0.175 m/s, with a final value of 1 m/s. Activity at the start (interactions and paranormal events) is 200%. For each aging phase, this value decreases by 15%, with a final value of 50%

data.name: THAYE_EV2
data.value: Does not age if a player is nearby.

data.name: THAYE_EV2_D
data.value: Does not age if a player is nearby.

data.name: SPIRIT
data.value: Spirit
